contextId.information: This is a polite way of saying "had died." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
This is a polite way of saying that he had an emission of semen. AT: "any man who is unclean because he had an emission of semen while he was asleep" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: any man who is unclean because of what happened to him at night

contextId.information: This is a polite way of saying to defecate. AT: "when you squat down to defecate" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: when you squat down to relieve yourself

contextId.information: Possible meanings are that Moses 1) openly forbids women and men to perform sexual acts as part of temple service or 2) uses a euphemism to forbid women and men to perform sexual acts to receive money. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: cultic prostitute ... among any of the daughters ... among the sons

contextId.information: This is a polite way to say "you will die." AT: "you will die and join your ancestors who have died before you" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: you will sleep with your fathers
